channel.title: Steam Friends..?
channel.description:
Hello again!
So I'm having a little bit of trouble. I live in Germany, but I speak English and not much German. I have no friends that play on steam, and the Germans that do talk on black ops 2 are always bickering about something.. "You suck" "Noob gun" "I will fook your mother" "Fook you".. My question is, are there any american-in-Germany clans out there? How can I make friends that are american on steam..?
